Package game.actor

Class Dinosaur

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.actor.Dinosaur
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface, NeedsPlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Allosaur, Brachiosaur, Pterodactyl, Stegosaur
public abstract class Dinosaur
extends Actor
implements NeedsPlayer
Abstract class creation of Dinosaur. Used as the template for all relation types of dinosaurs

  • Field Details

    • HUNGRY_LEVEL

      final int HUNGRY_LEVEL
      The threshold that indicates when the dinosaur is hungry.

    • behaviour

      protected Behaviour behaviour

    • actions

      protected Actions actions

    • SPECIES

      final java.lang.String SPECIES
      String that represents the dinosaur's species. Currently, there are 4 options: "Stegosaur", "Brachiosaur", "Allosaur", and "Pterodactyl".

    • age

      int age
      The dinosaur's current age.

    • PREGNANT_LENGTH

      final int PREGNANT_LENGTH
      The maximum duration of the dinosaur's pregnancy before it lays its egg.

    • ADULT_AGE

      final int ADULT_AGE
      The age threshold for when a dinosaur becomes an adult.

    • ADULT_DISPLAY

      final char ADULT_DISPLAY
      The display character for an adult dinosaur.

    • BABY_DISPLAY

      final char BABY_DISPLAY
      The display character for a baby dinosaur.

    • gender

      char gender
      Character that represents the dinosaur's gender, 'F' for female and 'M' for male.

    • isPregnant

      boolean isPregnant
      Boolean that indicates if the dinosaur is currently pregnant.

    • BREEDING_LEVEL

      final int BREEDING_LEVEL
      The minimum amount of hit points the dinosaur requires in order to start breeding.

    • UNCONSCIOUS_LIMIT

      final int UNCONSCIOUS_LIMIT
      The maximum threshold for turns before the dinosaur dies.

    • pregnancyCounter

      int pregnancyCounter
      Integer to keep track of hor many turns the dinosaur has been pregnant. Once a certain threshold is reached, it will lay its egg.

    • deathTimer

      int deathTimer
      The number of turns a dinosaur remains unconscious. Once it reaches a certain threshold, it will die.

    • MAX_THIRST

      final int MAX_THIRST
      The maximum water capacity of the dinosaur.

    • THIRSTY_LEVEL

      final int THIRSTY_LEVEL
      The threshold that indicates when the dinosaur is thirsty.

    • thirst

      int thirst
      Integer that represents the dinosaur's current thirst level.

    • CORPSE_HEALTH

      final int CORPSE_HEALTH
      The amount of hit points the corpse provides if another dinosaur were to consume it.

    • genderProbability

      private double genderProbability
      Default gender probability.

  • Constructor Details

    • Dinosaur

      public Dinosaur​(java.lang.String species, char displayChar, int age, int maxHitPoints, int hitPoints, int pregnant, int adultAge, char adultDisplay, char babyDisplay, int breed, int limit, int hunger, int maxThirst, int thirst, int thirstyLevel, int corpse_health)
      First constructor of the Dinosaur class. Has multiple intake variables to help build separate dinosaur types.
      Parameters:
      species - the species specified
      displayChar - the display char of the species
      age - the age
      maxHitPoints - the maximum hit points
      hitPoints - the current hit points
      pregnant - if the dinosaur is pregnant
      adultAge - the age of a fully grown dinosaur
      adultDisplay - the display char of the fully grown dinosaur
      babyDisplay - the display char of a baby dinosaur
      breed - the minimum hit points required for the dinosaur to breed
      limit - the number of a turns the dinosaur remains unconscious before it dies
      hunger - the minimum hit points that indicates if the dinosaur is hungry
      maxThirst - the maximum thirst level
      thirst - the current thirst level
      thirstyLevel - the minimum thirst level that indicates if the dinosaur is thirsty
      corpse_health - the hit points provided by the dinosaur's corpse

    • Dinosaur

      public Dinosaur​(java.lang.String species, char displayChar, char gender, int age, int maxHitPoints, int hitPoints, int pregnant, int adultAge, char adultDisplay, char babyDisplay, int breed, int limit, int hunger, int maxThirst, int thirst, int thirstyLevel, int corpse_health)
      Second constructor of the Dinosaur class. Has multiple intake variables to help build separate dinosaur types.
      Parameters:
      species - the species specified
      displayChar - the display char of the species
      gender - the gender of the dinosaur
      age - the age
      maxHitPoints - the maximum hit points
      hitPoints - the current hit points
      pregnant - if the dinosaur is pregnant
      adultAge - the age of a fully grown dinosaur
      adultDisplay - the display char of the fully grown dinosaur
      babyDisplay - the display char of a baby dinosaur
      breed - the minimum hit points required for the dinosaur to breed
      limit - the number of a turns the dinosaur remains unconscious before it dies
      hunger - the minimum hit points that indicates if the dinosaur is hungry
      maxThirst - the maximum thirst level
      thirst - the current thirst level
      thirstyLevel - the minimum thirst level that indicates if the dinosaur is thirsty
      corpse_health - the hit points provided by the dinosaur's corpse

      Returns:

    • isPregnant

      public boolean isPregnant()
      Checks if the current dinosaur is pregnant.
      Returns:
      true if pregnant, false if not

    • removeEgg

      public void removeEgg()
      Removes the current egg within the dinosaur inventory.

    • turn

      public void turn​(GameMap map, Location location)
      The generalized turn counter to update age and hungry values. It also sets the dinosaur's behaviour according to it's current stats. If dinosaur is unconscious due to thirst, it will check every turn to see if the location experiences rain.

    • pregnancyTurn

      public void pregnancyTurn()
      The pregnancy turn counter for keeping track and updating the pregnancy duration.

    • deathTimerUpdate

      public void deathTimerUpdate()
      The unconscious timer to determine if death is applicable.

    • unconsciousPeriod

      public void unconsciousPeriod​(GameMap map)
      The function to execute death if the dinosaur is unconscious for a certain amount of time.
      Parameters:
      map - The current instance of the map

    • increaseHunger

      public void increaseHunger​(GameMap map)
      Reduces the health points of a dinosaur and returns a message if the dinosaur is hungry.

    • increaseThirst

      public void increaseThirst​(GameMap map)
      Reduces the thirst points of a dinosaur and returns a message if the dinosaur is thirsty.
      Parameters:
      map -
